Motorbike Cover – you and your Bike

Statistics state that 10,000 bikers in the united kingdom cancel their insurance policies within the winter season each year. Many bike owners will lock away their two wheels however, even if kept in a garage, their bikes stay at risk. Thieves are very conscious that many motorbikes are kept in garages within the winter season and also over 600 bikes are stolen each month.

For those who have cancelled your policy as well as your bike is stolen you can’t create a valid claim. However, it ought to be easy to lessen the cover, cut costs but still keep up with the essential minimum cover against fire and theft within the winter. A frustrating feature of existing motorbike insurance policies is the fact that discount bonuses aren’t able to be accumulated with time. You might be capable of getting some type of discount in the event you remain claim free for any certain period with similar insurer, but this can be a rare occurrence.
